Love-Hate Relationship Garuda dan Sriwijaya
07 Nov 2019, 23:34 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Dok. AP II

Jakarta - Drama hubungan dua maskapai Garuda Indonesia dan Sriwijaya Air belum usai. Hari ini hubungan keduanya putus, tapi tak lama nyambung kembali. Awalnya, hubungan dua maskapai ini dikabarkan retak. Hal tersebut terungkap lewat pesan Direktur Pemeliharaan & Layanan Garuda Indonesia, Iwan Joeniarto yang tersebar ke awak media.Pesan itu mengacu hubungan kerja sama manajemen antara Sriwijaya Air dan PT Citilink Indonesia yakni anak usaha Garuda Indonesia. Dijelaskan, karena keadaan dan beberapa hal yang belum diselesaikan oleh kedua pihak maka Sriwijaya Air melanjutkan bisnis sendiri."Dengan demikian, Sriwijaya tidak akan lagi menjadi anggota Garuda Indonesia Group," bunyi pesan itu seperti dikutip detikcom, Kamis (7/11/2019).Kisah 'perceraian' Garuda dan Sriwijaya semacam ini bukan pertama kali terjadi. Beberapa waktu lalu dua maskapai ini kisruh karena GMF AeroAsia yang merupakan anak usaha Garuda memutuskan pelayanan. Alasannya, Sriwijaya menunggak pembayaran sampai Rp 800 miliar. Retaknya hubungan maskapai juga ditandai dengan 'bersih-bersih' orang Garuda di Sriwijaya.Meski begitu dua maskapai kembali rujuk yang ditandai dengan kerja sama manajemen (KSM) di awal Oktober 2019.Bagaimana dengan perceraian kali ini? Love-Hate Relationship between Garuda and Sriwijaya
Nov 7 2019, 23:34 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Doc. AP II

Jakarta - The drama of the relationship between the two Garuda Indonesia airlines and Sriwijaya Air has not yet ended. Today the relationship between the two broke up, but it didn't take long to reconnect. Initially, the relationship between the two airlines was reportedly fractured. This was revealed through the message of Garuda Indonesia Maintenance & Service Director Iwan Joeniarto, who was spread to the media crew. The message referred to the management cooperation relationship between Sriwijaya Air and PT Citilink Indonesia, a subsidiary of Garuda Indonesia. Explained, because of the situation and several things that had not been resolved by both parties, Sriwijaya Air continued its own business. "Thus, Sriwijaya will no longer be a member of the Garuda Indonesia Group," the message said as quoted by AFP on Thursday (11/07/2019) This kind of 'divorce' story of Garuda and Sriwijaya was not the first time this had happened. Some time ago these two airlines were chaotic because GMF AeroAsia, which is a subsidiary of Garuda, decided the service. The reason was that Sriwijaya was in arrears of payment of up to Rp800 billion. The break in the airline relationship was also marked by the 'cleaning up' of Garuda people in Sriwijaya. Even so, the two airlines returned, which were marked by management cooperation (KSM) in early October 2019. How about the divorce this time?
